title: Authorizes the racing and wagering board to impose fines upon entities participating in thoroughbred race meetings or off-track wagering; non-patrons
summary: Authorizes the racing and wagering board to impose monetary fines upon any corporation, association or person participating in a thoroughbred race meeting or off-track betting, whether licensed by such board or not, for violation of a board rule or regulation; does not apply to track or parlor patrons.
lawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the imposition of fines
